    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Business()
      Simple constructor to support Passenger.upgrade() in other subclasses
        Business(int bookingTime, int departureTime)
      Business Constructor (Partially Supplied) Passenger is created in New state, later given a Confirmed Business Class reservation, Queued, or Refused booking if waiting list is full.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Business

        public Business(int bookingTime,
        int departureTime)
         throws PassengerException
        Business Constructor (Partially Supplied) Passenger is created in New state, later given a Confirmed Business Class reservation, Queued, or Refused booking if waiting list is full.
        Parameters:
        bookingTime - int day of the original booking.
        departureTime - int day of the intended flight.
        Throws:
        PassengerException - if invalid bookingTime or departureTime
        See Also:
        asgnPassengers.Passenger#Passenger(int,int)

      • Business

        protected Business()
        Simple constructor to support Passenger.upgrade() in other subclasses

        Specified by:
        noSeatsMsg in class Passenger
        Returns:
        String containing "no seats available" warning message

      • upgrade

        public Passenger upgrade()
        Description copied from class: Passenger
        Method to create new Passenger instance based on upgrade to a higher fare class. Transition rules are specific to each fare class
        Specified by:
        upgrade in class Passenger
        Returns:
        Passenger of the upgraded fare class
